my_first_cookbook/mpm.description: Can be set to 'worker' or 'prefork' and defines the setting in httpd.conf.  Use 'worker' for Rails/Tomcat/Standalone frontends and 'prefork' for PHP.

my_first_cookbook/application_name.description: Sets the directory for your application's web files (/home/webapps/Application Name/current/).  If you have multiple applications, you can run the code checkout script multiple times, each with a different value for APPLICATION, so each application will be stored in a unique directory.  This must be a valid directory name.  Do not use symbols in the name.
